import React from "react"; import Logo from "../assets/img/logo-light.svg"; import Image from "../assets/img/login.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Register = ({ history, registerUser = (f) => f }) => { let _fname, _lname, _email, _phone, _password; const handleRegistration = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); registerUser( _fname.value, _lname.value, _email.value, _phone.value, _password.value ); }; return (
